mapper.select: select STUDY_NO as study_no, LIST_NAME as list_name, B_NO as b_no, B_WRITE_DAY as b_write_day, B_WRITER as b_writer, B_TITLE as b_title, B_CONTENT as b_content, B_HIT as b_hit from s_board
mapper.insert: insert into s_board (STUDY_NO, LIST_NAME, B_NO, B_WRITE_DAY, B_WRITER, B_TITLE, B_CONTENT, B_HIT) values (test_seq.NEXTVAL, '게시판', board_seq.NEXTVAL, sysdate, 'cj', #{b_title}, #{b_content}, 3)
